TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TimeSeekOrigin extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates the origin of a seek operation. The offset of the seek operation is relative to this origin.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin BeginTime = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The offset is relative to the beginning of the activation period of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline">.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin Duration = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The offset is relative to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>, the length of a single iteration. This value has no meaning if the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> is not resolved.
